document.full_text: the new york aviators are preparing to face off against the akwesasne warriors in the finals of the first season of the federal hockey league, with game 1 in brooklyn on saturday night.
document.title: new york aviators reach federal hockey league finals
lines_and_colors: the new york aviators are preparing to face off against the akwesasne warriors in the finals of the first season of the federal hockey league, with game 1 in brooklyn on saturday night.
